uthuru, uthurumada, nagenahira saha uuwa palathwalath mathale saha hambanthota disthrikkawalath witin wita ada (06) dinaye wasi athi wiya haki bawa kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa danum denawa.nagenahira saha uuwa palathwalath polonnaruwa saha mathale disthrikkawalath atham sthanawalata mili mitar 50ta wadi tharamaka thada wasi da athiwiya haki bawayi ema departhamenthuwa wadiduratath sandahan kale.diwayine sesu pradeshawala ada sawas kalaye ho rathri kalaye thanin thana wasi ho gingurum sahitha wasi athiwiya hakiyi.atham sthanawalata mi.mi. 100ka pamana tharamaka thada wasida athiwiya haki athara madhyama, sabaragamuwa, uuwa saha basnahira palathwala udasanakalaye di midum sahitha thaththwayak pawathiya haki bawayi kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa prakasha kara sitiye.
kese ho eka dinak sathiye dawasaka mathalan thorana handiye set ekath ekka set wela inna welawaka, mu thawa dennek ekka ape waththa paththata wiraya wage yanawa dutuweya.

yam rataka kalakaruwa yanu gaurawa sammana labiya yuthu ayaku bawa kima sadharanaya.eheth kalakaruwa thama hakiyawa ha prathibhawa anuwa karana lada karyayan udesa sammana illa illa illum pathra damiya yuththaku wanne nam eya mahath pudumayaki.!asadharanayaki!.eya wisheshayenma hata panna jyeshta kalakaruwata mahath awamanayaki.kalakaruwata rajayakin sammana pidiya yuththe ohu kala ihala sahithya ha kala sewayata gaurawayak washayeni.ee sadaha kalakaruwa sammana ayada sitiya yuthu nowe.
